Nigerian Christian Songbook: a digital interactive songbook

Link
sites.baylor.edu
Status
active
How they describe themselves
songbook
Blurb
This songbook was compiled by students at the Nigerian Baptist Theological Seminary. The songs on this site are organized into categories using the Titon Music Culture Model. We encourage you to explore and utilize this resource within your congregation or university classroom.
Creator(s)
Dr. Monique M. Ingalls
Steward(s)
Nigerian Baptist Theological Seminary and Baylor University Center for Christian Music Studies
Tools used
WordPress
